Common questions about our tube laser cu: Common questions about our tube laser cutting machines
Our tube laser cutting machines can proc: Our tube laser cutting machines can process round, square, rectangular, and oval tubes. Standard capacity ranges from customizable diameter, with optional upgrades available for tubes larger diameter options. The machine can handle tube lengths up to Customizable length (standard) with extended options up to 12000mm. Wall thicknesses depend on laser power and material type.
The bundle feeder system can hold up to: The bundle feeder system can hold up to 1800kg of raw tube stock arranged in bundles. Tubes are automatically separated and fed one by one into the four-chuck clamping system. The system is programmable for different tube sizes and can operate continuously without manual intervention. This dramatically increases productivity by eliminating manual loading time and allowing operators to focus on other tasks.
The four-chuck clamping system provides: The four-chuck clamping system provides superior stability compared to three-chuck systems. It minimizes vibration during cutting, prevents tube displacement, and ensures consistent positioning accuracy of High precision. This is especially important for thin-walled tubes and complex cutting patterns. The pneumatic system allows for quick tube changes while maintaining precise clamping force across different tube sizes.
Yes, with the optional bevel cutting hea: Yes, with the optional bevel cutting head upgrade, our tube laser can cut various bevel angles for pipe welding preparation. The system can create V-grooves, K-grooves, and other weld joint configurations at precise angles. This eliminates the need for secondary beveling operations and ensures perfect fit-up for welding. The SmartCut AI system automatically calculates optimal cutting paths for complex bevel geometries.
The fiber laser tube cutter can process: The fiber laser tube cutter can process carbon steel, stainless steel, aluminum, copper, brass, and titanium tubes. Maximum cutting thickness varies by material: carbon steel up to 8mm, stainless steel up to 6mm, aluminum up to 5mm (thicknesses depend on laser power). The machine handles both coated and uncoated tubes, including galvanized and powder-coated materials.
SmartCut AI is our intelligent control s: SmartCut AI is our intelligent control system that automatically optimizes cutting parameters in real-time. It analyzes tube geometry, material characteristics, and wall thickness to adjust laser power, cutting speed, and focal position. This reduces material waste by up to 18%, improves edge quality, and minimizes operator skill requirements. The system also includes automatic nesting software to maximize material utilization.
